msContents.summary: A treatise on Islamic doctrines and a commentary on ʻAqīdat al-Shaybānī, a treatise in verse by a leading Ḥanafī Islamic law scholar.

title: Kitāb Badīʻ al-maʻānī fī sharḥ ʻAqīdat al-Shaybānī.

title.#text: كتاب بديع المعاني في شرح عقيدة الشيباني

persName.#text: Ibn Qāḍī ʻAjlūn, Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh, 1427 or 1428-1471 or 1472
ابن قاضي عجلون، محمد بن عبد الله،

msItem.title: Kitāb badīʻ al-maʻānī fī sharḥ ʻAqīdat al-Shaybānī.

supportDesc.extent: 40 leaves : 200 x 145 (155 x 85) mm, bound to 200 x 150 mm

layoutDesc.layout: Chiefly 21 long lines with poetry in two staggered lines; catchwords on versos, lower left.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in naskh in black ink; pointed.

binding.p: Plain paper sides over pulpboard with flap; flap painted pink; detached from textblock.

origin.p: Item is undated, likely copied in the 17th or 18th century.
